subject: Re: [junit] Hi Need help on Testing
msgSnippet: Hi Vijay, Any luck in getting good guidence on Junit testing? I am also in the same situation like you and struggling to figure out how to use Junit for Java
messageBody:
Hi Vijay,

Any luck in getting good guidence on Junit testing? I am also in the same
situation like you and struggling to figure out how to use Junit for Java
applications testing.

If you get any good clues on Junit testing please let me know. I would do
the same if I know some thing.

All the best,

Bye,
Ram.
----------------
